learn:
This is a simple web page that can host all of your elements.

Once you've created one or more elements you can embed them on this page. (You can also copy their embed codes and place them anywhere else on the Internet.)

Click the 'Edit' button to add or remove elements on your page. To add a title and text to the page, add a 'Plain Text' Element.

The URL (internet address) of this page is based on your CASH Music username.

copy.publish_campaign_info: Publishing a campaign sets it live as your public page, using the theme you've set above.
